text.section:
An investigating committee may exercise its powers:
when the General Assembly is in session; and
when the General Assembly is not in session, if the investigating committee is authorized to do so:
by law;
by the resolution that establishes the investigating committee; or
by the law or resolution from which the investigating committee derives its investigatory powers.

section.section: An investigating committee shall adopt rules that govern its procedures, including the conduct of hearings.
The rules may not be inconsistent with law or any applicable rules of the General Assembly.
